about.desc:
I graduated in 2007 with a major in communications and networking. After I left school, I went to the beautiful Hangzhou and became a SEO engineer.

I touched Ruby at the beginning of 2009, and then I fell in love with it. In the summer of 2009, I became a Ruby developer, up to now.

I'm now a full-stack developer, I use Ruby On Rails to develop server side application; use Rack/Grape to develop API for front-end; use Javascript, CSS, HTML to develop front-end such as Web/Mobile app; use React/Flux to develop Single Page Application.

react.my homepage: My home page(the site you are looking at right now): Run on React + Flux + webpack + babel

ruby.ruby doc: Ruby doc: Online api documents for Ruby and Ruby's famous open source library, such as Rails, Rake etc.

vb.kuaihou: Niu Niu Kuai hou: Aids for King Of Pirate
